title: TechWiz E-Commerce
subtitle: Performance-Focused Electronics Store
description: A comprehensive e-commerce platform for electronics (mobiles, laptops, accessories) emphasizing security, scalability, and user-friendly design.
story: TechWiz began as a small-scale storefront but evolved into a fully featured platform. We integrated secure payment processing, user-friendly checkout, and robust product management to address common challenges in electronics e-commerce. Today, it offers a seamless experience for customers and merchants alike.
features: Detailed sales charts for performance analysis

title: DishDiary
subtitle: Global Recipe Discovery
description: A modern web application that helps users discover and explore recipes from various cuisines worldwide.
story: DishDiary began as a simple recipe finder but quickly evolved into a fully interactive platform. With category-based browsing, detailed cooking instructions, and mobile-first design, DishDiary aims to make culinary exploration fun and engaging for all food enthusiasts.
features: Detailed cooking instructions and ingredient lists

title: Netflix Clone
subtitle: Streaming UI Replica
description: A React-based platform inspired by Netflix’s UI/UX, providing row-based content, dynamic banners, and a responsive design.
story: The Netflix Clone project was initiated to deepen my understanding of React, API integrations, and responsive UI. Leveraging Tailwind CSS and the TMDB API, it evolved into a functional prototype that showcases popular and trending titles, giving users a streamlined experience to browse, select, and preview content.
features: Potential expansions: search, trailer pop-ups, user authentication

title: OLX Clone
subtitle: Buy & Sell Platform
description: A modern web application for buying and selling products, featuring category-based browsing, detailed product views, and secure user authentication.
story: The OLX Clone project was initiated to explore full-stack development focused on user-generated content and real-time data. With React and Tailwind CSS for the front-end and Firebase for secure authentication and data storage, it evolved into a platform that seamlessly handles product listings, image uploads, and user interactions.
features: Detailed product views with images and descriptions

title: Personal Portfolio
subtitle: Showcase of My Work and Skills
description: A responsive React-based website to highlight my projects, technical skills, and professional background, deployed on Vercel.
story: This portfolio began as a way to unify all my projects—TechWiz, DishDiary, Netflix Clone, OLX Clone—and provide a central hub for showcasing my abilities. Over time, I refined the UI, added smooth animations, and integrated dynamic content to offer an engaging, professional overview for recruiters and collaborators.
features: Fully responsive layout using React and Tailwind CSS
Project listing with detailed descriptions and live demos
Smooth animations and transitions for a modern user experience
Deployed on Vercel for fast and reliable hosting

title: Blog-Platform
subtitle: React-Based Blogging System
description: A modern platform enabling users to create, read, update, and delete blog posts with a responsive, user-friendly interface.
story: This project began as a simple blog site but evolved into a full-featured platform. It showcases CRUD operations for posts, dynamic routing for individual blog pages, and an intuitive editor for creating engaging content. By focusing on scalability and ease of use, it serves as a solid foundation for future features like user authentication, commenting, or advanced SEO.
features: Responsive UI using React and Tailwind CSS
Dynamic routing for individual post pages
Rich text editor for creating styled blog entries
Potential for user authentication and commenting

title: News App
subtitle: Real-Time News Aggregator
description: A modern web application that fetches and displays the latest news from multiple sources, offering category-based filtering, search functionality, and a responsive design.
story: Originally a personal aggregator for staying updated with current events, the News App evolved into a fully functional platform. It leverages an external news API to fetch headlines and articles in real time, categorizing them for quick access. By focusing on usability and responsiveness, it delivers a streamlined experience for users looking to stay informed.
features: Category-based news filtering (e.g., technology, sports, business)
Real-time article fetching from an external news API
Search functionality to find specific articles or keywords
Responsive design ensuring a smooth experience across devices
Potential for pagination or infinite scroll for browsing archives
